abstract: Ohio State University coach Urban Meyer announces J T Barrett will replace Cardale Jones as quarterback in upcoming game against Rutgers University.
lead_paragraph: Coach Urban Meyer announced that No. 1 Ohio State would replace Cardale Jones at quarterback with Barrett.

headline.main: J.T. Barrett to Lead Buckeyes at Rutgers

snippet: Coach Urban Meyer announced that No. 1 Ohio State would replace Cardale Jones at quarterback with Barrett.

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
